title: Franco: the story of an immigrant
creator_credit: Salvatore Greco, Randall Richardson and Fine Film Productions
brief_description: Franco, an italian immigrant employed as a labourer, is doubtful about the advantages of living in Canada. He becomes nostalgic for the old country and makes arrangements to return with his wife and family. An encounter with an old friend helps him to open his eyes to reality.
